summary: Patrick Kane  is an NHL ice hockey right winger/center for the Chicago Blackhawks.
full_text:
Patrick Timothy Kane II , is an American professional ice hockey right winger for the Chicago Blackhawks of the National Hockey League . The Blackhawks selected him with the first overall pick in the 2007 NHL Entry Draft.
Kane won his first Stanley Cup in 2010. He won his second Stanley Cup in 2013 and won the Conn Smythe Trophy as the most valuable player of the playoffs. Kane won his third Stanley cup in 2015 as the Blackhawks defeated the Tampa Bay Lightning. Kane also represented the United States at the 2010 and 2014 Winter Olympics.
title: Patrick Kane
